channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 11:24 Plowing the threat of artebors to Pokrovskaya territorial community.Creck on further reports.
item.description: 🟢 11:24 Plowing the threat of artebors to Pokrovskaya territorial community.Creck on further reports. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟠 11:22 Drones Attack in shelters!
item.description: 🟠 11:22 Drones Attack in shelters! This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
